CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services

Class CustomerServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CustomerServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerService

    @Service
 @Validated
public class CustomerServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerService

    Customer Service Implementation

    This Class Functions as a Service implementation which implements CustomerService.class - Interface that represent All the Functions Available for a User from type - Customer.

    • Method Detail

      • PurchasedCoupon

        public void PurchasedCoupon(long couponId,
                            long customerId)
                     throws CouponSystemException,
                            PurchesedExecption,
                            UnFoundExecption

        Purchased Coupon

        A method that receives a couponId and customerId and validates it and validates if the Expiration Date of the specific coupon is valid as well as the amount in stock.
        uses the CustomerRepository.class to check if the customer already been bought the same coupon in the past
        if no - its adding the coupon to the customer coupon list and also update the amount of the coupon using the CouponRepository.class.
        Specified by:
        PurchasedCoupon in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        couponId - - couponId (long)
        customerId - - customerID (long)
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no Coupon/Customer with those Id's in the Data Base.
        PurchesedExecption - - in case Coupon is out of stock/Out of date/Coupon has been in the past has been in the past.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

      • getCustomerCoupons

        public java.util.List<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons(long customerId)
                                          throws UnFoundExecption

        Get Customer Coupons

        A method that receives a customerId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CustomerRepository.class to return a list of the customer specified Coupons from the data base .
        Specified by:
        getCustomerCoupons in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        customerId - - customer id (long)
        Returns:
        coupons - List of coupons
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no Coupons found that matches with the giving Id's in the Data Base.

      • getAvailableCoupons

        public java.util.List<Coupon> getAvailableCoupons(long customerId)
                                           throws CouponSystemException,
                                                  UnFoundExecption

        Get Available Coupons

        A method that receives a customerId validates it and uses the CouponRepository.class to bring all coupons in system.
        and also uses CustomerRepository.class to identify the coupons that the client already been purchased in the past.
        then the method do a subtract action between the list and return a list of the available coupons for this specific client.
        Specified by:
        getAvailableCoupons in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        customerId - - customer ID (long)
        Returns:
        coupons - List of coupons
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no coupons available for the client in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a there is no coupons in the system at all.

      • login

        public Customer login(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      ClientType clientType)
               throws LoginExcecption

        Customer Login

        A method that receives customer Login Parameters -validates it.
        (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CustomerRepository.class to validate the customer details
        if the validation process was successful - return the object of the customer, if not - Login Exception.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        name - - name (String)
        password - - password (String)
        email - - email (String)
        clientType - - clientType (ClientType.enum)
        Returns:
        Customer - customer(object)
        Throws:
        LoginExcecption - - in case there is no Customer found that matches with the giving Id's in the Data Base,Login Failed.
